span.span: Represents a set of certificates used for building a certificate chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 证书已规范化。The certificates are normalized. 如果构造的 X509Chain 中缺少证书，则 System.net.security.sslstream 将尝试通过在证书存储中搜索证书来解析这些证书，或通过网络获取证书（如果允许）。If a certificate is missing in the constructed X509Chain, SslStream will try to resolve them either by searching for the certificate in the certificate stores or by fetching them over the network, if allowed. 可以跨多个流使用来保存链构造和提高性能。The can be used across multiple streams to save chain construction and improve performance.
